message.content:
We can “derive” a tax‐payable number by “summing” all the tax amounts from the sale transactions (and – if available – subtracting any tax acting as input tax from purchase documents). In our problem no purchase transaction shows an input tax amount, so the tax “collected” on sales is carried forward as tax payable.

Let’s illustrate briefly (note: all sale transactions show in the “tax_amount” column):

• Sale20240103002: 2,118.29  
• Sale20240103003: 10,510.19  
• Sale20240105007: 714.14  
• Sale20240105008: 2,897.35  
• Sale20240105009: 103.73  
• Sale20240106010: 489.44  
• Sale20240106011: 148.59  
• Sale20240107013: 108.03  
• Sale20240107014: 2,193.99  
• Sale20240108015: 2,688.52  
• Sale20240112018: 489.74  
• Sale20240115020: 539.57  
• Sale20240115021: 2,076.09  
• Sale20240117024: 11,012.82  
• Sale20240117025: 2,999.61  
• Sale20240117026: 622.49  
• Sale20240118028: 2,866.06  
• Sale20240118029: 12,732.74  
• Sale20240119031: 10,118.06  
• Sale20240120033: 484.40  
• Sale20240121035: 11,645.83  
• Sale20240121036: 9,430.35  
• Sale20240123039: 2,403.95  
• Sale20240124041: 600.31  
• Sale20240126044: 2,630.00  
• Sale20240126045: 10,927.59  
• Sale20240126046: 2,497.59  
• Sale20240128050: 554.80  
• Sale20240128051: 2,004.80  
• Sale20240129053: 149.71  
• Sale20240129054: 671.71  
• Sale20240130055: 2,781.94  
• Sale20240131057: 2,828.89  
• Sale20240131058: 696.08  
• Sale20240131059: 13,846.00  
• Sale20240201061: 103.08  
• Sale20240202063: 9,767.16  
• Sale20240202064: 685.47  
• Sale20240202065: 548.45  
• Sale20240203066: 132.94  
• Sale20240203067: 142.12  
• Sale20240203068: 136.74  
• Sale20240204069: 2,240.80  
• Sale20240204070: 137.86

A careful addition of these 44 tax_amount values gives a total of 143,478.02. (Again, since none of the purchase documents list an input tax, the net effect is simply the sum of the output tax collected.)

Therefore the final “Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable” is as follows:

{
  "solution": {
    "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable": "143478.02"
  }
}
